about_the_game:
DEEP DOWN is a dark but cute card game about emotional unpacking,

Your world is overrun by boxes that pile up and accumulate, filled with cards representing your repressed emotions. Empty those boxes and confront the painful memories that hold you back.


Play cards in verbal encounters with a multitude of characters whose personalities affect the nature of the cards they play. Match their cards to restore your relationship with them and receive more consideration from what they play.





Cards convey your emotions. They transform as the discussion progresses and their effects are modified according to their emotional charge.





The consequences of the cards you play and the choices you make during events persist and affect the way the characters interact with you and others.





Cards are created at the end of each encounter, representing what has been expressed during the conversation. The cards that are left behind, are repressed and will be used against you later.





A mysterious shadow guards these memories and prevents you from going too far, becoming increasingly menacing the closer you get to your goal.





As you unpack your boxes, unlock parts of yourself that will make you feel more empowered. Use these new skills to defeat the many forms of the shadow that infiltrates your nights. Put an end to this cycle of helplessness!

FEATURES


🟣 A wide variety of characters, whose distinct personalities are reflected in the nature of their cards and the way they are played.
🟣 Emotion cards come in a variety of forms and their effects change as their emotional charge varies, creating hundreds of variations.
🟣 Numerous abilities that help you create synergies within your deck.
🟣 Multiples intimate stories about the character's past as you unpack boxes filled with memories.
🟣 An exploration of the various dimensions of anxiety-depressive disorders through different videogame representations ranging from perceptual artifacts to direct impacts on gameplay.
🟣 An expressive visual treatment that matches and adapts to the anguish and fragmentation of the main character.

short_description: Deep Down is a narrative roguelike deckbuilder about emotional resilience. Restore your relationships through card-based dialogues, express, transform and even repress emotions conveyed through cards, and confront buried memories to break the cycle.
supported_languages: English, French, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
